lines.content: Hi I'm a second year Computer Engineering student in CS2113!
So far I'm working on saving data feature and editing saved data features. As our project progresses, this will change.
Hi ! I am a year 2 computer Engineering Student. I am excited to start working on this project with my team.
# Govindaraj Roshni Daksha - Project Portfolio Page
InternSprint is your Ultimate Internship Application Assistant.
🚀 Passionate about building impactful projects and exploring AI/ML 🌟
Hi! I am Theertha Aravind, a year 2 computer engineering student.
I will be contributing to our Tp project 'InternSprint'.
* Entry point of the InternSprint application.
* Main entry-point for the InternSprint application.
* Runs the InternSprint program until termination.
* Reads the user command and executes it, until the user issues the exit command.
* Exits the program after displaying the exit message.
